/usr/bin/c++ -D__STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS -g CMakeFiles/Screen-capture.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Screen-capture.dir/ScreenRecorder.cpp.o -o Screen-capture  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavcodec.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavformat.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavutil.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavdevice.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libswresample.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libswscale.so -pthread
